name: The Battle Under Dusk - Part 1: Operation:Gods
description: The year is 2046, the world is in crisis, Aliens from an unknown world have invaded earth and conquered it. Many think there is no hope left for mankind, but there is.. Who or what is that? He is YOU! You are Anders Bailey of the United Nations Security Council. You have been sent to the "Gods Land" outpost to exterminate one of the Alien Hive-minds that reside there. But on your way, you trip down a pit. You go unconcious from the fall, when you wake up; you find something interesting.... ;:WARNING:; DO NOT USE THE "kill *monster*" COMMANDS, it will mess up the scripts!
